column2: Double-click to open a direct link to the Grand Sahil Casino so you can purchase Sandstorm orbs.
Unlocked when player owns the Heart of Thorns expansion.

Activate the Bloodstone Ascender to unleash its ruinous power and float through the air instead of running. Engaging in combat will end the effect.  

You will automatically reequip this item while running outside of combat if you have the Automatic Bloodstone Ascender effect enabled on your character.
Double-click to apply this look to any other heavy coats.

Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
